info.name: C2M API v2 - Getting Started (With Examples)
info.description:
Educational collection with realistic test data organized by usage patterns to help new users get started with the C2M API.

This collection demonstrates 16 common patterns across 3 categories:
- Most Frequently Used (3 patterns)
- Bulk Operations (3 patterns)
- Advanced Patterns (10 patterns)

All request bodies contain realistic example data (names, addresses, IDs) that can be used for immediate testing.

item.name: Most Frequently Used
item.description: The most common API calls for everyday use

description.content:
Submit a single document to one recipient using jobTemplate

Uses docSourceAll (requestId variant) and recipientAddressSource (singleAddress variant) with realistic test data
Added as a part of security scheme: bearer

Submit a single document to multiple recipients

Uses recipientAddressSource (addressList variant) with custom merge fields (foo1, foo2) - realistic addresses
Added as a part of security scheme: bearer

item.name: Address capture - PDF with embedded addresses

request.name: Submit a single pdf addressCapture job

description.content:
Submit PDF where addresses are extracted from the document

No recipientAddressSource needed - addresses are captured from PDF content
Added as a part of security scheme: bearer

item.name: Bulk Operations
item.description: High-volume processing for multiple documents or recipients

request.name: Submit a single pdf split addressCapture job

description.content:
Split a multi-page PDF and capture addresses from each section

Uses pdfSplitJobsNoAddress (startPage/endPage without recipientAddressSource) with realistic page ranges
Added as a part of security scheme: bearer

request.name: Submit a single pdf split job

description.content:
Split a multi-page PDF and provide recipient address for each section

Uses pdfSplitJobsWithAddress (startPage/endPage WITH recipientAddressSource) - realistic data
Added as a part of security scheme: bearer

item.name: Multiple documents from ZIP with address capture

request.name: Submit a multi zip addressCapture job

description.content:
Submit multiple documents from a ZIP file with embedded addresses

Uses zipDocumentSource (zip-only document sources) with realistic IDs
Added as a part of security scheme: bearer

item.name: Advanced Patterns
item.description: Advanced features and edge cases for complex workflows

request.name: Submit a multi doc merge job

description.content:
Combine multiple documents into one before mailing

Uses mergeDocumentSource (documentsToMerge array) with realistic document IDs
Added as a part of security scheme: bearer

body.raw:
{
  "mergeDocumentSource": [
    "<integer>",
    "<integer>"
  ],
  "recipientAddressSource": {
    "firstName": "John",
    "lastName": "Smith",
    "address1": "123 Main Street",
    "address2": "Apt 4B",
    "address3": "",
    "city": "New York",
    "state": "NY",
    "zip": "10001",
    "country": "USA",
    "nickName": "Johnny",
    "phoneNumber": "+1-555-123-4567"
  },
  "jobTemplate": "template_zs6xx0gu",
  "paymentDetails": {
    "googlePayDetails": {
      "googlePaymentDetails": {}
    }
  },
  "returnAddress": {
    "firstName": "Ana",
    "lastName": "Spencer",
    "address1": "76461 Hauck Hills",
    "city": "Cordiaborough",
    "state": "Utah",
    "zip": "94683",
    "country": "Micronesia",
    "company": "Rosenbaum, Tromp and Kohler",
    "address2": "1574 Israel Park",
    "address3": "1322 9th Street"
  },
  "jobOptions": {
    "documentClass": "primary",
    "layout": "basic",
    "productionTime": "2026-02-19T13:03:52.339Z",
    "envelope": "basic",
    "color": "default",
    "paperType": "basic",
    "printOption": "standard",
    "mailClass": "default"
  },
  "tags": [
    "<string>",
    "<string>"
  ]
}

description.content:
Specify job options directly instead of using a template

Uses jobOptions (documentClass, layout, etc.) instead of jobTemplate with realistic values
Added as a part of security scheme: bearer

item.name: Using document URL instead of upload

description.content:
Reference a document by URL instead of uploading

Uses docSourceAll (url variant) to fetch document from external source - realistic URL
Added as a part of security scheme: bearer

Add custom tags to track and organize jobs

Uses tags array (optional field) for job categorization with realistic tag examples
Added as a part of security scheme: bearer

item.name: Naming an address list for reuse

description.content:
Create a named address list that can be referenced in future jobs

Uses addressListName (optional field) to save address list for reuse with realistic name
Added as a part of security scheme: bearer

Specify how the job should be paid for

Uses paymentDetails (optional field) with creditCard variant - realistic test card data
Added as a part of security scheme: bearer

item.name: Multiple documents from ZIP - specify addresses

description.content:
Submit multiple documents from ZIP with specified addresses for each

Uses multiZipJobs array with docSourceZipFile and recipientAddressSource - realistic data
Added as a part of security scheme: bearer

Submit multiple different documents with different recipients

Uses multiDocJobs array with docSourceAll and recipientAddressSource per job - realistic data
Added as a part of security scheme: bearer

Reference a previously uploaded document by its ID

Uses docSourceAll (documentId variant) to reference stored document - realistic ID
Added as a part of security scheme: bearer

Reference a previously saved address list by its ID

Uses recipientAddressSource (addressListId variant) to reference stored list - realistic ID
Added as a part of security scheme: bearer
